Firebase|||Firebase: DEV - Deploy Rules.notes:
Deploy rules to DEV only

Firebase Rules — Why Push Rules Only

🔒Service Account / IAM – New roles, revoked perms, Cloud Function access changes.
🔒Schema Changes – New fields/collections (rules must match new paths).
🔒 Auth / Claims – Add/remove custom claims (admin, role, etc.).
🔒 Access Policies – Tighten/relax visibility (owner-only, familyVisible, aiVisible). 
🔒 Env Sync – Align DEV/PROD or multiple projects.
🔒 Bug / Exploit Fixes – Patch accidental open access without full deploy.
